nodes.text: The Requiem was an Imperial Gozanti-class cruiser that was part of the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At one point, it flew over a body of water with its complement of four TIE/ln space superiority starfighters, which were carried on the cruiser's underside by docking tubes.

The Requiem was first mentioned in the 2015 Imperial Assault Carrier Expansion Pack for the miniatures game Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game by Fantasy Flight Games, on a card of the same name. The card was illustrated by Andrius Anezin.
